methods.name: InstanceGroup
methods.description: You can create and manage groups of virtual machine instances so that you don't have to individually control each instance in your project.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.exists
params.description: • Whether the instance group exists or not.

methods.name: get
methods.description:
Get an instance group if it exists.

You may optionally use this to "get or create" an object by providing an object with autoCreate set to true. Any extra configuration that is normally required for the create method must be contained within this object as well.

params.name: options.autoCreate
params.description: • Automatically create the object if it does not exist. Default: false

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Add one or more VMs to this instance group.

params.name: vms
params.description: • VM instances to add to this instance group.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.operation
params.description: • An operation object that can be used to check the status of the request.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.operation
params.description: • An operation object that can be used to check the status of the request.

methods.name: getVMs
methods.description: Get a list of VM instances in this instance group.

examples.caption: To control how many API requests are made and page through the results manually, set autoPaginate to false.
Get the VM instances from your project as a readable object stream.
If you anticipate many results, you can end a stream early to prevent unnecessary processing and API requests.

params.name: options.filter
params.description:
• Search filter in the format of {name} {comparison} {filterString}.
    • name: the name of the field to compare
    • comparison: the comparison operator, eq (equal) or ne (not equal)
    • filterString: the string to filter to. For string fields, this can be a regular expression.

params.name: options.maxApiCalls
params.description: • Maximum number of API calls to make.

params.name: options.pageToken
params.description: • A previously-returned page token representing part of the larger set of results to view.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.nextQuery
params.description: • If present, query with this object to check for more results.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Remove one or more VMs from this instance group.

params.name: vms
params.description: • VM instances to remove from this instance group.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.operation
params.description: • An operation object that can be used to check the status of the request.

methods.name: setPorts
methods.description: Set the named ports for this instance group.

params.name: ports
params.description: • A map of names to ports. The key should be the name, and the value the port number.

params.name: callback.err
params.description: • An error returned while making this request.

params.name: callback.operation
params.description: • An operation object that can be used to check the status of the request.
